overview: The filmmaker Jeppe RÃ¸nde has invited 10 of the world's foremost researchers - and a robot! - to rethink our relationship with technology and its dilemmas from the outside. Philosophers, anthropologists, archaeologists and programmers show us through their thought experiments that our relationship with technology is just as much about our relationship with ourselves.
tagline: Notes on the human condition by 10 scientists and a robot
title: Almost Human
